column5: has anyone been on graham road this year. just want to know the condition it is in. any info would be appreciated.
I drove by it a month ago and it looked rough just going by. That's all I know. But with log trucks coming out of it ,I bet it is beat up. Paul

Talked with my cousin who came back from Wawang 3 weeks ago, he said it was about like other years. He did run up to Alley lake one day, so the road should be ok up to that point. Actually, if the logging trucks are using it, the road should be decent, at least the section they are using. They grade it every week to keep the trucks rolling. But one heavy rain and it will be rough again.
thanks for the info. we're heading as far as pakashkan. hoping for the best
